link.title: COVID-19 Information | Welcome to Tuscumbia City Schools

meta.name: Keywords
meta.content: Tuscumbia City Schools, Deshler High School, Deshler Middle School, RE Thompson Intermediate School, GW Trenholm Primary School

input.name: Search
input.onclick: if(Keyword.length<3){alert('Your Keyword has to be atleast 3 characters long.\n\nPlease enter a valid Keyword.');};

p.span: Beginning on Tuesday, March 17, 2020, all schools will be closed except for essential personnel. March 17-18, 2020 will be used for cleaning all buildings. After Wednesday, March 18, 2020 all schools will be closed until further notice. There shall be no entry in to any building, athletic area, or other indoor areas by anyone other than essential personnel from March 18, 2020 through April 5, 2020.

Enrichment is a time for students to practice previously learned skills and to reinforce learning. Students will not receive grades for their participation in enrichment activities and enrichment activities are not required. Tuscumbia City Schools believes that, while students are not on campuses nor in their regular classrooms, students should continue to work at their own pace through enrichment lessons. This is a crucial time for students to work on what they have learned and to remain sharp in all of their skills. Think of it as practice in the same manner as music, athletics, or other extracurricular pursuits. The Tuscumbia City Schools website has multiple learning opportunities linked to their website under the COVID-19 Information
Students taking Advanced Placement courses need to continue to work on previously learned skills and visit the resources listed on the AP College Board website.

span.style: color: #888888; font-size: 24px; font-family: 'times new roman', times;
